ELEMENT.CREATOR: Zoovy: JT
ELEMENT.TITLE: Featured Product and two column product list - experimental
ELEMENT.SUMMARY: This layout has a 'featured product' at the top (thumbnail, name, description, view details graphic and, if product has no options, an add to cart graphic). This product will be selected from the first item in the list. After the featured item, a dual column product layout which displays slightly differently in each column. This layout will put the multipage chooser ONLY at the bottom of the list. To the right of the product list are the subcategories in a vertical column. Descendtree is turned on, so if the current category has no subcategories, the parent set will be used (will not show top level categories).
